response.original_title: Sohla - Celebration under the grey sky
response.overview: In a small village where tradition defines destiny, young Pashya eagerly awaits his Sohla, the sacred coming-of-age ceremony. Dreaming of fame and idolizing Salman Khan, he sees it as his moment to shine. But when his father Ramdas's desperate attempt to ease the family's debts ends in tragedy, Pashya's world collapses.  Stripped of innocence, he shoulders the weight of survival with his mother and sister. As grief and duty converge on the day of the ritual, Pashya learns that Sohla is not just a spectacle, but an inheritance of resilience, sacrifice, and true manhood.
response.title: Sohla - Celebration under the grey sky
